name: shroomate
description: Mushroom picker's assitant and social media
author: Jaka Krivic <jaka.krivic@gmail.com>

scripts.copy:db-docker: docker cp data/db_species.json web-dev-mongo-db:/db_species.json; docker cp data/db_users.json web-dev-mongo-db:/db_users.json
scripts.import:db-docker: docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db mongoimport --db shroomate --collection Species --mode upsert --upsertFields id --jsonArray --file db_species.json; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db mongoimport --db shroomate --collection Users --mode upsert --upsertFields id --jsonArray --file db_users.json
scripts.init:db-docker: npm run drop:db-docker; npm run create:db-init; npm run copy:db-docker; npm run import:db-docker; npm run clean:db-docker
scripts.transfer:db-docker-atlas: docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db bash -c "mongodump -h localhost -d shroomate -o ./"; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db bash -c "mongorestore --drop --uri mongodb+srv://app@shroomate.bcxlfpk.mongodb.net/shroomate ./shroomate"; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db bash -c "rm -rf ./shroomate"
